text:
probably do a kitchen table as well.
Can we just do them together so we can track in one place? It will help with the ovearll accounting and help us to understand when we are at the "buy
instead of give back point" for us both.
Thanks...
Message 1248 of 4024
It’s a Zoom call. I still believe it reflects better on us to be in the same room. Appearance matters when you are trying to make a good impression to
ask a favor.
My offer still stands. The place may be a bit cluttered as I was not planning on it. But I promise we’ll have an attractive set up with a nice background.
Sent:02/09/2024 at 09:47 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/09/2024 at 10:24 AM)
Subject:AD’s SAAS Meeting
Message 1249 of 4024
Thank you for the invitation. I will politely decline and am looking forward to the discussion with the Lori.
I have got a good start on transcripts, both requested and have reached out to his prior teacher at Lakeview. I am working on identifying a current
teacher at ICS.
Sent:02/09/2024 at 10:26 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/09/2024 at 10:29 AM)
Subject:Re: AD’s SAAS Meeting
Message 1250 of 4024
Can I ask why you won’t do this?
It really does reflect better on us as a family. And if there are any yellow flags later, they won’t look back on it and think “ yeah now that I think about
it, they were kinda weird, I wonder if their home life is the real issue”
Let’s just be civil for a good cause. It’s good all around.
Sent:02/09/2024 at 10:33 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/09/2024 at 10:48 AM)
Subject:Re: AD’s SAAS Meeting
Message 1251 of 4024
If you think that I am trying to manipulate you I want to be transparent. Yes! I want to find a great cause that will help Adrian. AND give you and me
one ever so small victory where we can reflect that we worked together. As a team to do something good.
As soon as you shared the questions, I wrote back immediately and said I would do it. I had it done in an hour, and I thought it was pretty good.
Sent:02/09/2024 at 10:46 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/09/2024 at 10:48 AM)
Subject:Re: AD’s SAAS Meeting
